overview: Tal is co-founder and CEO at Takipi, a start-up company leveraging Big Data technology to change how developers debug software and manage downtime in the cloud. Previously, Tal was co-founder and CEO at VisualTao, a Sequoia backed start-up which was acquired by Autodesk in 2009. Following the acquisition, Tal served as Director responsible for product management, development and social marketing of Autodeskâ€™s flagship web and mobile product line used by millions of professional users worldwide. Prior to co-founding VisualTao Tal served as a software Architect at IAI Space Industries focusing on real-time satellite tracking systems.
